start_evaluation_soon: Evaluation will start in a second
low_blink_rate_warning: Low blink rate, you may be experiencing dry eyes!
high_blink_rate_warning: High blink rate, you may have visual fatigue!
welcome: Welcome to the Eye Health App!
description: An app that helps you monitor your eye health through blink rate analysis.
buttonInstruction: Press the button below to go to the app and start using it!
blinkAnalysis: The app counts your blinks using the camera, analyzes them, and alerts you about your blinking status
remember_to_blink: Remember to blink and relax your eyes!
app_restart_required: The app will restart to apply changes.
error_detecting_face: Error detecting face, please try again.
